{{cpp/experimental/ranges/title|Semiregular}}
{{cpp/experimental/ranges/concepts/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=experimental/ranges/concepts|since=ranges|1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
concept bool Semiregular = Copyable&lt;T&gt; &amp;&amp; DefaultConstructible&lt;T&gt;;
}}

The {{tt|Semiregular}} concept specifies that a type is both copyable and default constructible. It is satisfied by types that behave similarly to built-in types like {{c|int}}, except that they need not support comparison with {{tt|{{==}}}}.
